quote: There wasn’t a bit of innocence or purity in him. He was sinful and cynical. Unapologetic. He cared nothing for the world. He just ate its fruits and roamed its wilds and didn’t need anyone.
quote_letters: THERE WASNT A BIT OF INNOCENCE OR PURITY IN HIM HE WAS SINFUL AND CYNICAL UNAPOLOGETIC HE CARED NOTHING FOR THE WORLD HE JUST ATE ITS FRUITS AND ROAMED ITS WILDS AND DIDNT NEED ANYONE
